channel.title: R on Not Just a Statistic
channel.description: Recent content in R on Not Just a Statistic

item.title: Welcome
item.description: This website is currently in the works. I want to create a blog. I have tons of material. Just need time setting it up. Stay tuned! # Define a deck of cards values <- c("Ace", 2:10, "Jack", "Queen", "King") suits <- c("Hearts", "Diamonds", "Clubs", "Spades") deck <- expand.grid(values, suits, stringsAsFactors = FALSE) colnames(deck) <- c("Value", "Suit") # Define the game n.players <- 8 n.decks <- 1 # Define the final deck based on n.
